main event: A bluish-white ball of light with a tail was observed in Springfield and Dayton, Ohio, on 2 Mar 61.
interesting points: The object appeared to be three to four times the size of an F-104 and moved in a straight line at very high speed,Two witnesses separated by several miles saw the object at the same time,The sighting lasted 3-4 minutes with an observation length of 15-20 seconds,The object may be a balloon, fiery aircraft, or meteorite, and it was characteristic of a fireball.
sighted object: bluish-white ball of light with a tail
witness description: Two witnesses separated by several miles
